page.title: 07NEIGHBOURHOOD STUDY/2
page.content:
The main changes in Holywood over the last ten years are newly built buildings and modern houses and flats.
Changes needed in Holywood include a new leisure-centre with a swimming-pool. Fourteen people worked in Holywood, six worked elsewhere and four people had retired. Most of the people who work in Holywood are housewives and the other types of work their families do are hairdressing, waitressing and fitting.
The number of people working in Holywood was nine but the highest number of people working elsewhere was fifteen and they worked in Belfast.
